casebody.data:
BOGER
v.
SOLOMON, et al. No. 158P06-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Derrick D. Boger, Polkton, for Boger, Derrick D. Catherine F. Jordan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of February 2016 by Defendant for Mandamus:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
